casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Edward WILSON. No. 257A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2007.

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jane A. Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney,

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of June 2007 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Wilson) shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2007."
